venue.name: Microsoft New England Research and Development Center

item.description:
Featuring contemporary jazz by Elan Trotman, saxophonist and spoken word by
Remon Jourdan.


Enjoy a night of jazz, spoken word and networking with young professionals
and others who are committed to giving back to the Boston community. Learn
more about how Easter Seals is influencing the cause by helping to provide
children and adults with disabilities equal opportunities to live, learn,
work and play.

Enter to win a Xbox bundle (Xbox 360 & Xbox Kinect), Celtics and Bruins tickets and many others.
Raffle tickets: 1 for $5; 3 for $10.  All proceeds to benefit Easter Seals
of Massachusetts.

Our mission: Easter Seals provides services to ensure that children and adults with disabilities have equal opportunities to live, learn, work and play.

Additional Details:

  • Cost: $20 in Advance, $25 at the door (Includes 2 free drink tickets, hors d’oeuvres and an exclusive gift bag)

  • On-site parking is available. Microsoft is also a five-minute walk from the
    Kendall Square T Station

Contact Debbie Stevens at 800-244-2756 ext. 315 for additional information.
item.name: Easter Seals Boston: Connect for a Cause!
